author: Source: Click Orlando
title: 'Aladdin' still magical to classic animated film's... - Click Orlando
text:
Without question, "Aladdin" voice stars Scott Weinger and Linda Larkin are thrilled over how the 1992 classic Disney animated film continues to be discovered and held dear by new generations of viewers. Still, Weinger told me in a recent phone conversation, some people have been harder to convince than others when it comes to explaining the cultural impact of the movie -- a circumstance that fortunately changed at Disney's D23 fan convention last summer.
 Click Orlando.
